oai_dc:dc.dc:title: 1864 diary of William S. Fisher, 11th (Holman's) Tennessee Cavalry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Handwritten diary (selected pages) of William Fisher, Co. C, 11th (Holman's) Tennessee Cavalry. Gives Mr. Fisher's 1864 account as a soldier in Army of Tennessee at Battles of Tunnel Hill, Resaca, Nashville and subsequent retreat. Includes his obituary.
